archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0404
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a BSS Solution, I must be able to apply customer discounts with security controls in place, so that customers can be given discounts, have discounts removed, or have discounts changed, with respect to their device renewal programme.

properties.value: OOTB, details about discounting to be discussed during product catalogue detailed session

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
